summary: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

keywords: first daughter|the white house|president|secret service agent|photographer
title: Deseando libertad
